title: Update Sunshine Layout and  Add Scrolling Weather

quizDescription.text:
Now that you've explored creating simple layouts in the FavoriteToys app, it's time to start working on our main app for the course, sunshine.
During this exercise, you'll set up Sunshine's layout by modifying the boilerplate android code.

Add Scrolling Weather :
Add Scrolling Weather Exercise
Time to make Sunshine contain a scrolling list of weather forecasts. In this exercise, you'll display some dummy weather data in a ScrollView.
